name: Matomo Analytics Integration
description: This plugin lets site owners easily add Matomo Analytics code to their sites.
author: TidyCustoms

messageInOptions.text: Please remember that this plugin does not output the analytics code in preview mode by default. You can change this behavior using the 'Output code in Preview Mode' option.

config.name: previewMode
config.label: Output code in Preview Mode
config.note: Enable this option only when checking or debugging analytics code generation. Leaving this option enabled can lead to false tracking data being generated when browsing your website in preview mode.

config.name: cookieBannerIntegration
config.note: Enabling this option will integrate this plugin with Publii's native Cookie Banner, allowing visitors to consent to cookies installed by Matomo. This option is recommended if you want to ensure compliance with privacy regulations.

config.name: cookieBannerGroup
config.label: Cookie Group ID
config.note: Please specify which Cookie Group ID of the Cookie Banner you wish to associate with the Matomo script. If it does not exists, add a new Cookie Group Name with the Cookie Group ID specified above in the Privacy Settings section of the Site Settings. For more details please visit our documentation.
